landing.name: Leathercrafting Courses
landing.description: Learn to create your own minimalist wallet in this Leathercrafting 101 course. Students will use one of many designs offered while learning the processes of creating a wallet from start to finish. Students will start by tracing their design onto the leather, cut out the design, sew the wallet according to template specifications and finish the edge of the wallet with beeswax. The best part; every time you reach for your wallet, you will be reminded of your awesome work! This class is a great introduction to leatherworking, welcome to men, women and children ages 16+.

landing.name: Leatherwork For Sale
landing.description: Most my work once completing will be but up for sale on this site. If you do not find what you are looking for I am always happy to discuss custom orders.

classes.name: Leathercrafting 101 | Minimalist Wallet
classes.description: Learn to create your own minimalist wallet in this Leathercrafting 101 course. Students will use one of many designs offered while learning the processes of creating a wallet from start to finish. Students will start by tracing their design onto the leather, cut out the design, sew the wallet according to template specifications and finish the edge of the wallet with beeswax. The best part; every time you reach for your wallet, you will be reminded of your awesome work! This class is a great introduction to leatherworking, welcome to men, women and children ages 16+.

classes.name: Leathercrafting 101 | Make Your Own Belt
classes.description: Learn to make your own leather belt using vegetable tanned leather with your choice of hardware. The end result is something which can be worn daily and will last a lifetime! This class is a great introduction to leatherworking, welcome to men, women and children ages 16+.
